JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Mihai Poalelungi;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON and PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE , respectively . They are represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in PERSON . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the applicants entrusted their merchandise to a third party for transportation from GPE to GPE . On DATE , the third party was arrested at the NORP customs on charges of smuggling and the applicants’ merchandise was seized by police as evidence .

By a final judgment of DATE ORG acquitted the third party and ordered the restitution of the applicants’ merchandise . Since a part of the seized merchandise had been stolen from the police station the applicants brought an action against ORG ( “ the Ministry ” ) seeking compensation for the stolen goods .

By a final judgment of DATE ORG ruled in favour of the applicants and ordered the Ministry to pay Mr FAC United States dollars ( ORG ) ( CARDINAL Moldovan lei ( ORG ) at the time ) in compensation for the stolen merchandise and LAW ( MONEY ( ORG ) at the time ) in respect of legal costs . It also ordered ORG to pay PERSON the equivalent in the national currency of ORG CARDINAL ( MDL CARDINAL ) in compensation for the stolen merchandise and MDL CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) in respect of legal costs .
On DATE the bailiff received the enforcement warrant .
On DATE a bailiff instituted administrative proceedings against the competent administration of the ORG which had failed to comply with the final judgment in favour of the applicants .

Following the communication of the applications , on DATE the Government informed the ORG that on DATE and on DATE Mr Lozinschi had been paid MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL ) and MDL CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) , respectively , representing the amounts awarded by the judgment of DATE . They also informed that on DATE and on DATE PERSON had been paid MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL ) and MDL CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL ) , respectively , representing the amounts awarded by the judgment of DATE . The ORG also attached copies of receipts signed by the applicants .

The Government further informed the ORG that after having received those amounts the applicants brought separate actions against the ORG , seeking compensation for pecuniary damage suffered as a result of their impossibility to use their money DATE . By a final judgment of DATE ORG ruled in favour of PERSON and ordered the Ministry to pay him MDL CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) in compensation for pecuniary damage suffered as a result of his impossibility to use his money . On DATE ORG ruled in favour of PERSON and awarded her compensation in the sum of ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) . In DATE a bailiff received the enforcement warrants in respect of the judgments of DATE and DATE , respectively , and on CARDINAL DATE the applicants have been paid the amounts due . The ORG also submitted copies of the relevant documents .
